Under the practice of ORG , referred to by the Government , if a failure to pay taxes is intentional and continuing , it is the most recent version of Article CARDINAL - CARDINAL that is applicable to acts which occurred prior to its amendment , provided that part of the criminal activity took place after the amendment came into force . Article CARDINAL - CARDINAL § CARDINAL does not create a separate offence , but merely qualifies the elements listed in DATE .
